ModMetadata.Name: Better Code Editor [StationeersMods]
ModMetadata.Author: vinus
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Better Code Editor[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods
This mod adds extra lines of code and increases the max length of the lines ([i]or even decrease[/i]) You can change these settings using the config.
you can also go here to get the dll itself if you want to just put it in your bepinex/plugins folder: https://github.com/TerameTechYT/StationeersSharp/tree/development/Build/x64/Release
ModMetadata.InGameDescription: Better Code Editor WARNING: This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods.
